title: tasks/{taskId}
description: Schema for a task document in the Firestore `tasks` collection.

details.description: Description of what needs to be done.

completed.description: Whether the task has been completed.

created.description: Timestamp when the task was created.

user.description: Firestore reference to the user document who owns this task.

examples.title: walk the dog
examples.details: walk the dog for 30 minutes and make sure he uses the bathroom.
